short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to keep track of your water consumption

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As the planet's temperature rises, it is increasingly important to stay hydrated. This extension helps manage water consumption throughout the day.

Key Features

Track Water Consumption: Easily log your water intake and keep track of your progress towards your daily hydration goal.

Personalize Your Daily Goal: The extension can calculate your daily water intake requirement, or you can set a custom goal to suit your needs.

Receive Timely Reminders: Get notifications every 90 minutes through Chrome to remind you to drink water.
